casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Arik FETSCHER. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 13, 2016.

Arik Fetscher, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Ronald G. Weller, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 162 Conn.App. 145, 130 A.3d 892 (2015), is denied.
